mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review VALUES (#{rev_no}, #{item_no}, #{user_no}, #{rev_title}, #{rev_content}, #{rev_score}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rev_title=#{rev_title}, rev_content=#{rev_content}, rev_rdate=now() WHERE rev_no=#{rev_no}
mapper.select: SELECT rev.rev_no, rev.item_no, user.user_no, user.user_id, item.item_name, rev.rev_title, rev.rev_content, rev.rev_score, rev.rev_rdate FROM review rev JOIN user ON rev.user_no = user.user_no JOIN item ON rev.item_no = item.item_no ORDER BY rev.rev_rdate DESC;

SELECT rev.rev_no, rev.item_no, user.user_no, user.user_id, item.item_name, rev.rev_title, rev.rev_content, rev.rev_score, rev.rev_rdate FROM review rev JOIN user ON rev.user_no = user.user_no JOIN item ON rev.item_no = item.item_no Where rev.rev_no = #{rev_no} ORDER BY rev.rev_rdate DESC;
